actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Administrator of General Services to take suitable action to provide public buildings underground when proven to improve security, energy efficiency, and cost effectiveness.

summary.text: Amends the Public Building Cooperative Use Act of 1976 to direct the Administrator of the General Services Administration to construct or acquire underground structures for use as public buildings if such structures will improve security for Federal personnel and records, energy efficiency, and cost effectiveness. Amends the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to redefine "public building" to include underground structures.

titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of General Services to take suitable action to provide public buildings underground when proven to improve security, energy efficiency, and cost effectiveness.
